questions.name: question1
questions.html: With limited time and resources, Speedy Stream wants to improve part of the prototype first. To decide what to prioritize, we want to gather your feedback on the video elements that you think need the most enhancement for the current prototype you just experienced (before enhancing any of the five elements). How critical are the improvements on each video element in the current prototype for you to understand the content in a weather forecast video?

rows.text: Audio Quality: The sound of the audio is clear and not muffled
Video Resolution: The image of the video is clear and not pixelated
Audio Stability: The audio is smooth and and does not stutter
Motion Smoothness: The video visuals plays smoothly and does not jitter
Audio-Video Syncronization: Audio and Video are in sync

questions.name: likert-text
questions.title: In a few sentences, why did you feel this way?
